name: PowerCenter:Set "Stop on errors" to 1 on Sessions
description: In case of errors, if the « stop on errors » is not set to 1 in a Session, job wont be interrupted, with a data corruption risk.
output:
This report lists all Mapping with Session not containing stop on errors session
It provides the following information:
Session full name
rationale: If "Stop on errors" is not set to 1, no errors will be raised at the session level in case of, and job wont be stopped and will terminate successfully whatever errors encountered. This could lead to data corruption and impact robustness.
remediation: Try to manage error for each existing session
total: Number of Workflows, Worklets and Folders having Sessions

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
